authIdentity.description:
SMTP authentication information.
`Additional Validators:`
* must be a syntactically valid email address

from.description:
The sender address.
`Additional Validators:`
* must be a syntactically valid email address

sendResolved.description: Whether to notify about resolved alerts.

smarthost.description:
The SMTP host through which emails are sent.
`Additional Validators:`
* should only include the characters: a-zA-Z0-9_./@&?:-

to.description:
The email address to send notifications to.
`Additional Validators:`
* must be a syntactically valid email address

name.description:
`Additional Validators:`
* must be unique
* should only include the characters: a-zA-Z0-9-

apiKey.description:
The API key to use when talking to the OpsGenie API.
`Additional Validators:`
* should only include the characters: a-zA-Z0-9-

apiUrl.description:
The host to send OpsGenie API requests to.
`Additional Validators:`
* must be a syntactically valid url address

priority.description: Priority level of alert. Possible values are P1, P2, P3, P4, and P5.

sendResolved.description: Whether to notify about resolved alerts.

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags attached to the notifications.

msTeams.description: Microsoft Teams webhooks require special handling. If you set this property to true, it is treated as such

sendResolved.description: Whether to notify about resolved alerts.

url.description:
The endpoint to send HTTP POST requests to.
`Additional Validators:`
* must be a syntactically valid url address

Authorization.description: Accepts technical credentials and api gateway access.
